00013         public Server(ushort _serverId, InSimSetting _settings): base(_settings)
00014         {
00015             serverId = _serverId;
00016             settings = _settings;
00017 
00018             log = new sLog(serverId);
00019             command = new CommandServer(serverId);
00020             try
00021             {
00022                 //ConnectionLost += new ConnectionLost_EventHandler(lostConnectionToInSim);     // Occurs when connection was lost due to an unknown reason
00023                 //Reconnected += new Reconnected_EventHandler(reconnectedToInSim);                      // Occurs when connection was recovert automatically
00024                 initializeInSimEvents();                                // Initialize packet receive events
00025             }
00026             catch (Exception error)
00027             {
00028                 log.error(error.Message + ", serverId: " + serverId + ", IP: " + settings.serverIp + "\r\n");
00029             }
00030         }
00031         public Server() { }

00033         private struct LicenceIdCarIdMap
00034         {
00035             LicenceIdCarIdMap(byte _licenceId, byte _carId)
00036             {
00037                 licenceId = _licenceId;
00038                 carId = _carId;
00039             }
00040             public byte licenceId;
00041             public byte carId;
00042         }
00043         //When Needed to Reconnect, Since Timeout Can Occure, this will Ask for Multithreaded Request
00044         public bool connectionRequest = true;

00061         private const uint TIMER_PING_PONG = 30000; private uint TimerPingPong = 0;
00062 
00063 #endregion
00064         new public void update(uint diff)                       //update called By Session
00065         {
00066             if (TIMER_PING_PONG < (TimerPingPong += diff))
00067             {
00068                 log.debug("Request Ping!\r\n");
00069 
00070                 packetStore.AddToTcpSendingQueud(new Packet( Protocol_Id.UDP, Packet_Size.TINY_PACKET_SIZE, Packet_Type.TINY_MULTI_PURPOSE, new PacketTiny(1, Tiny_Type.TINY_PING)) );
00071                 pingTime = DateTime.Now.Ticks;
00072 
00073                 TimerPingPong = 0;
00074             }
00075 
00076             //Race update
00077             //race.Update(diff);
00078 
00079             //Car update
00080 
00081             //Licence update
00082 
00083         }
00084         #region Utils
00085         private List<byte> GetPlayerListFromLicenceId(byte _licenceId)
00086         {
00087             List<byte> _carList = new List<byte>();
00088             foreach (LicenceIdCarIdMap _current in licenceIdCarIdMap)
00089             {
00090                 if(_current.licenceId == _licenceId)
00091                     _carList.Add(_current.carId);
00092             }
00093             return _carList;
00094         }
00095         private byte GetLicenceFromPlayerId(byte _carId)
00096         {
00097             foreach (LicenceIdCarIdMap _current in licenceIdCarIdMap)
00098             {
00099                 if (_current.carId == _carId)
00100                     return _current.licenceId;
00101             }
00102             return 0;
00103         }

00114         private void MSO_MessageOut(PacketMSO MSO)
00115                 {
00116             /* Text Color
00117              * Red = 1
00118              * Green = 2
00119              * Yellow = 3
00120              * Blue = 4
00121              * Purple = 5
00122              * Cyan = 6
00123              * White = 7
00124              * Gray = 8
00125              * Gray = 9
00126              * Black = 0
00127              */
00128             if (/*MSO.licenceId == 0 ||*/ !licenceList.ContainsKey(MSO.UCID))
00129                 return;
00130 
00131             if (MSO.Msg[MSO.TextStart] == settings.CommandPrefix)
00132             {
00133                 log.debug("Received Command: " + MSO.Msg.Substring(MSO.TextStart) + ", From User: " + licenceList[MSO.UCID].GetConnectionPlayerName() + "\r\n");
00134 
00135                 command.Exec(licenceList[MSO.UCID], MSO.Msg.Substring(MSO.TextStart));
00136             }
00137             else
00138             {
00139                 log.chat(licenceList[MSO.UCID].GetConnectionPlayerName() + " Say: " + MSO.Msg.Substring(MSO.TextStart) + "\r\n");
00140             }
00141         }
00142         
00143         private void LicenceJoinHost(PacketNCN NCN)
00144                 {
00145             if (licenceList.ContainsKey(NCN.licenceId))
00146             {
00147                 log.error("LicenceJoinsHost(), Licence is reconnecting!!! NCN -> UCID= " + NCN.licenceId + ", UName=" + NCN.licenceName + ", PName=" + NCN.driverName + ", Flags=" + NCN.driverTypeFlag + ", Admin=" + NCN.adminStatus + "\r\n");
00148                 licenceList.Remove(NCN.licenceId);
00149             }
00150 
00151             licenceList.Add(NCN.licenceId, new Licence(NCN));
00152 
00153             log.debug("LicenceJoinsHost(), Added to Licence list: NCN -> UCID= " + NCN.licenceId + ", UName=" + NCN.licenceName + ", PName=" + NCN.driverName + ", Flags=" + NCN.driverTypeFlag + ", Admin=" + NCN.adminStatus + "\r\n");
00154                 }
